original_text: If you do that, the Lord will chase out all those nations as you move into the land. They are greater and stronger than you are, but you will take the land from them.
korean_text: 여호와께서 그 모든 나라 백성을 너희 앞에서 다 쫓아내실 것이라 너희가 너희보다 강대한 나라들을 차지할 것인즉

sentences.original_text: the Lord will chase out all those nations
sentences.korean_translation: 주님께서 그 모든 민족들을 쫓아내실 것이다

sentences.original_text: as you move into the land
They are greater and stronger than you are
but you will take the land from them
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 너는 그들에게서 그 땅을 차지할 것이다
